meaningMnemonic: You thought it would be a good idea to <radical>say</radical> the <radical>body</radical> <radical>measurement</radical>s of everyone in your village and now you have to <kanji>apologize</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You were told you had to <kanji>apologize</kanji> by the village <reading>sha</reading>man (しゃ). At first you didn't even know why everyone was glaring at you, but the shaman took you aside and explained. And now she's standing behind you with her arms crossed as you apologize to everybody.
